title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Filming and Photography
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Filming and Photography                Filming and Photography       Please note that basic commercial filming and photography applications and payments must be received a minimum of 21 days before the requested date.  Applications cannot be "rushed" for any reasons. Larger or more complex filming project applications must be received at least 30 days in advance. Production groups that have never worked at Mount Rushmore National Memorial before are also required to complete a site visit before submitting an application. This ensures that all parties are aware of the possible filming locations and that these locations are specifically listed on the permit application. Download the Guidelines for Commercial Filming and Photography (183 KB PDF) to get more information about permits for these activities. Application forms are below:  Commercial Filming / Still Photography Permit Application (Short Form) - 627 KB PDF  Commercial Filming / Still Photography Permit Application (Long Form) - 881 KB PDF
